title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 10 §§ 50-3.3 - Medical record access review committee
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 10 §§ 50-3.3 - Medical record access review committee

State Regulations
(a) Every reasonable effort will be made to include on the committee a professional in the same or related field as the health care provider who is the subject of the appeal. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 10
§§
50-3.3

Amended

New

York State Register September 30, 2015/Volume XXXVII, Issue 39, eff. 9/30/2015

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
